column2: What has General Motors ever done for us?
column4: As its six-week long strike comes to an end, join us as we list all of the automotive inventions and conveniences brought to us by GM

column2: Biggest Native American tribes in the U.S. today
column4: Native American origins reach far back to late in the ice age when the first humans ventured across the Bering Strait and into what is now North America. Stacker has compiled a list of the 42 most prominent Native American tribes today based on 2010 Census data.
